summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1319, for the improvement of West Forty-first Street and West Forty-second Street, from Third Avenue Northwest to Sixth Avenue Northwest; Sixth Avenue Northwest, from West Forty-first Street to West Forty-fifth Street; Fourth Avenue Northwest and Fifth Avenue Northwest, each from West Forty-second Street to West Forty-fourth Street, all in the City of Seattle, by laying water mains, etc., under Ordinance No. 14965 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
